```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 20, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(x, y)
plt.show()
```

```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 20, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(x, y)

ax.axhline(y=0.75, color='r')

plt.show()
```

```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 20, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(x, y)

ax.axvline(x=7.5, color='y')

plt.show()
```
